name: Ceramic cutter
description: Electrical instrument used for cutting any ceramic product. It comes with a table and a power supply

name: Oscilloscope
description: Electronic test instrument that graphically displays varying signal voltages, usually as a two-dimensional plot of one or more signals as a function of time

name: Xbox with Kinect + games
description: Xbox console with auxiliary device Kinect, that allows the player to play games with sensor

name: Hitachi Video beam
description: Projector device that replicates the content on a screen, connected with HDMI cable, through a light beam

name: Mop cart
description: A little cart that carries clean water and residual water resulting from the mopping

name: Guantes de fuerza
description: Cloth gloves with anti-slip material and a protector wristband. Specialized for strength jobs

name: Bongos
description: Wooden percussion instrument with two hand drums

name: Electric guitar
description: Electric musical instrument. It includes a tuner but not an amplifier

name: Screwdriver set
description: This set has 8 screwdrivers, 4 of which have flat head, and the other 4 have a starred head

name: Stompbox
description: Auxiliar device to the electric guitar that allows the addition of effects to the sound of the instrument

name: Rock band battery xbox 360
description: Xbox's auxiliar device that allows the user to play battery in the Rock Band games

name: HDMI M-F Cable
description: HDMI Cable with a male and a female head. 2 meters long

name: Multimeter
description: Measuring device that reads alternate and direct current, resistence and voltage

name: Polishing machine
description: Machine used for polishing the floors with the help of a special wax
